data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kosterin, Oleg E. (2018): Rediscovery of Lestes nigriceps Fraser, 1924 (Odonata: Lestidae) in eastern Cambodia. Zootaxa 4526 (4): 561-575, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4526.4.8|1 occurrence
